root.name: F/A-18 Precision Strike Fighter
root.description: The game includes 28 missions set during a conflict between North and South Korea and includes a mission editor for additional user created content.While the original F/A-18 Korea was praised at it's release in 1997, Precision Strike Fighter got a colder reception, many criticized the fact that it was a full price release and yet featured only minor graphical enhancements over the then 5 year old predecessor.
